Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Do not miss out on this 3BR/1baths apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhoods easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. 77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
